title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager does not allow creating a JAR file if there are unsaved editors. After pressing finish, the JAR creation process fails without any option to save the unsaved editors.
EB: The JAR packager should allow creation of a JAR file even if there are unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, a dialog should be shown to allow saving the unsaved editors before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open a file in the project but do not save any changes. 
2. Open the JAR packager for the project. 
3. Enter all the required fields such as path, destination, name of JAR packager description, etc. 
4. Attempt to create the JAR file by clicking on the finish button.
